from LGC_Ticket where OwnerOpenID = #{owneropenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Deleted = 0 order by status

from LGC_Ticket where PayerOpenID = #{payeropenid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and Deleted = 0
